Label: Purpose
Source: To link items that have been derived from another item (e.g. a digitized shapefile from a historical map).

Label: Entry Guidelines
Source: Enter the ID of the item(s) from which the resource was derived.

Label: Commentary
Source: This is one of several fields that describe how records relate to each other. This field is intended to describe a derivate relationship where the resource is based wholly on another, rather than being a version of it (see [Is Version Of](../ogm-aardvark/#is-version-of)).
